text:
Hi everyone, i hope everyone is going fine :slightly_smiling_face:

I have a question, is it possible to have a HubSpot blog, where the publications are a mix of blog posts and landing pages ?

my client want to publish new guides to download (in landing apges) and want them to be promoted as blog posts in the blog..

or the best way to do this is to write a quick blog post, with inside a cta going to the LP ?

We've done this in the past, an old remnant of not having HubDB in the early days of the COS. What we do is add a text field like "custom link" or similar to the post template, then on the listing template if that field is empty use the default {{ content.absolute_url }} otherwise the title and button to the content are linked to the value of {{ content.widget_data.custom_link.body.value }}
What <@U26BLKGE4> suggested is also what we have done in the past.
